org.opendaylight.controller.networkconfig.neutron

Interface INeutronPortAware


  • public interface INeutronPortAware
    This interface defines the methods a service that wishes to be aware of Neutron Ports needs to implement

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int canCreatePort(NeutronPort port)
      Services provide this interface method to indicate if the specified port can be created
      int canDeletePort(NeutronPort port)
      Services provide this interface method to indicate if the specified port can be deleted
      int canUpdatePort(NeutronPort delta, NeutronPort original)
      Services provide this interface method to indicate if the specified port can be changed using the specified delta
      void neutronPortCreated(NeutronPort port)
      Services provide this interface method for taking action after a port has been created
      void neutronPortDeleted(NeutronPort port)
      Services provide this interface method for taking action after a port has been deleted
      void neutronPortUpdated(NeutronPort port)
      Services provide this interface method for taking action after a port has been updated

    • Method Detail

      • canCreatePort

        int canCreatePort(NeutronPort port)
        Services provide this interface method to indicate if the specified port can be created
        Parameters:
        port - instance of proposed new Neutron Port object
        Returns:
        integer the return value is understood to be a HTTP status code. A return value outside of 200 through 299 results in the create operation being interrupted and the returned status value reflected in the HTTP response.

      • neutronPortCreated

        void neutronPortCreated(NeutronPort port)
        Services provide this interface method for taking action after a port has been created
        Parameters:
        port - instance of new Neutron Port object

      • canUpdatePort

        int canUpdatePort(NeutronPort delta,
                NeutronPort original)
        Services provide this interface method to indicate if the specified port can be changed using the specified delta
        Parameters:
        delta - updates to the port object using patch semantics
        port - instance of the Neutron Port object to be updated
        Returns:
        integer the return value is understood to be a HTTP status code. A return value outside of 200 through 299 results in the update operation being interrupted and the returned status value reflected in the HTTP response.

      • neutronPortUpdated

        void neutronPortUpdated(NeutronPort port)
        Services provide this interface method for taking action after a port has been updated
        Parameters:
        port - instance of modified Neutron Port object

      • canDeletePort

        int canDeletePort(NeutronPort port)
        Services provide this interface method to indicate if the specified port can be deleted
        Parameters:
        port - instance of the Neutron Port object to be deleted
        Returns:
        integer the return value is understood to be a HTTP status code. A return value outside of 200 through 299 results in the delete operation being interrupted and the returned status value reflected in the HTTP response.

      • neutronPortDeleted

        void neutronPortDeleted(NeutronPort port)
        Services provide this interface method for taking action after a port has been deleted
        Parameters:
        port - instance of deleted Port Network object
